patthana22.4:1.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.4:1.1_1: Nakusalaṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana22.4:2.1_1: Paṭhamaṁ gaṇitakena ekaṁ, dutiyaṁ gaṇitakena ekaṁ, tatiyaṁ gaṇitakena ekaṁ, sabbattha nava pañhā.)
patthana22.4:3.1_0: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana22.4:4.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.4:4.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana22.4:5.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.4:5.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava. (Hetusahetukasadisaṁ.)
patthana22.4:6.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nahetuvippayuttañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo hetusampayutto ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.4:6.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana22.4:7.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.4:8.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.4:9.1_0: Naakusalaṁ nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.4:10.1_0: Naabyākataṁ nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Gaṇitakena tīṇi pañhā.)
patthana22.4:11.1_0: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
